author: butek
msg: If the address book sample fails in the build, the build still succeeds.  The
problem is samples.addr.Main swallows any exceptions.  A fix is to remove
the try/catch block since we don't want the exception caught in the sample.

author: butek
msg: The new include test was using the same port name as the samples/addr

msg: Remove erroneous package declaration - there isn't supposed to be
